library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)
library(gapminder)

```{r}
library(raster)
library(rgdal)
```

```{r}
HARV_data <- raster("data/HARV_dsmCrop.tif")
```
```{r}
summary(HARV_data)
```

```{r}
str(HARV_data)
```

```{r}
HARV_data <- as.data.frame(HARV_data,xy=TRUE) 
```

```{r}
ggplot(HARV_data) + geom_boxplot(aes(x=x,y=y))
```

```{r}
ggplot(data=gapminder,aes(x=lifeExp)) + geom_histogram()
```
